1. User Registration and Authentication

- Users must create an account and provide accurate information to access AXForAsset.

- Authentication mechanisms (e.g., email verification, two-factor authentication) may be required to secure user accounts.

2. User Responsibilities

- Users are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of their account credentials.

- Users agree to provide accurate and truthful information when registering and using AXForAsset.

3. Platform Usage

- AXForAsset provides a platform for users to buy and sell game assets.

- Users must comply with all applicable laws and regulations when using AXForAsset.

4. Listing and Purchasing Assets

- Sellers must accurately describe assets listed for sale on AXForAsset.

- Buyers agree to review asset details and conditions before making a purchase.
5. Termination\n\n- AXForAsset reserves the right to suspend or terminate user accounts that violate these conditions or for any other reason deemed necessary by AXForAsset.
